title: Game went slow (WTF?)
body: I was in a ranked game and i usually get 100 ping which is normal for me but for some reason my game just went slow, all  movement in the game was slow, i lost a ranked game coz of it, my fps and ping were find but idk how but my whole game was slow and kept missing few frames, i restarted my internet and game several times but same thing kept happening, can someone explain this bs.. i want my LP back

replies.body:
Sounds like you were experiencing packet loss. 

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj


---

You can also [utilise Riot’s Log Reader to see what’s happening with your network.]( https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)
